billdocHAggregator.mainSelect: select * from ( select t.dbi_cd_punto||to_char(t.ldall,'YYYYMMDD') as lk, -- 0 e.acdan, -- 1 e.cflg9, -- 2 e.dbi_original_key_pr, -- 3 to_char(f.dt_inizio_fornitura,'YYYYMMDD') as dtini, -- 4 to_char(t.ldall,'YYYYMMDD') as dtfine, -- 5 to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') as dtoggi, -- 6 decode(e.caliv,'Aliquota ordinaria', '01', 'Aliquota ridotta', '02', 'ER'), -- 7 ableinh, -- 8 dec_ktokl(e.cserv, e.acatc), -- 9 dec_tipolettura(e.cflg4, t.ldall), -- 10 row_number() over (partition by t.dbi_cd_punto, lmari, lprog order by ldall) ordine from instmgmt_diint i, dbi_user.ifc_sap_letture_ele_anubis t, v_contratti e, dbi_user.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura f, instln_data z where i.anlage = e.cpod and e.cncon in (select cncon from z_pr_in_lavorazione) -- and e.dbi_original_key_pr in ('PR313295') and t.dbi_cd_punto = e.dbi_original_key_pr and t.dbi_cd_punto = z.vstelle and t.dbi_cd_punto = f.dbi_punto_key and t.ldall > to_date(i.eadat, 'YYYYMMDD') and ldall is not null) where ordine = 1 order by lk
